title: Kraken Arcaflow scenarios
description: Serial execution of Arcaflow Python plugins. See https://github.com/arcaflow for details.

namespace_pattern.title: Namespace pattern
namespace_pattern.description: Regular expression for target pod namespaces.

name_pattern.title: Name pattern
name_pattern.description: Regular expression for target pods. Required if label_selector is not set.

kill.title: Number of pods to kill
kill.description: How many pods should we attempt to kill?

label_selector.title: Label selector
label_selector.description:
Kubernetes label selector for the target pods. Required if name_pattern is not set.
See https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/overview/working-with-objects/labels/ for details.

kubeconfig_path.title: Kubeconfig path
kubeconfig_path.description:
Path to your Kubeconfig file. Defaults to ~/.kube/config.
See https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/configuration/organize-cluster-access-kubeconfig/ for details.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: Timeout to wait for the target pod(s) to be removed in seconds.

backoff.title: Backoff
backoff.description: How many seconds to wait between checks for the target pod status.

namespace_pattern.title: Namespace pattern
namespace_pattern.description: Regular expression for target pod namespaces.

name_pattern.title: Name pattern
name_pattern.description: Regular expression for target pods. Required if label_selector is not set.

kill.title: Number of pods to kill
kill.description: How many pods should we attempt to kill?

label_selector.title: Label selector
label_selector.description:
Kubernetes label selector for the target pods. Required if name_pattern is not set.
See https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/overview/working-with-objects/labels/ for details.

kubeconfig_path.title: Kubeconfig path
kubeconfig_path.description:
Path to your Kubeconfig file. Defaults to ~/.kube/config.
See https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/configuration/organize-cluster-access-kubeconfig/ for details.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: Timeout to wait for the target pod(s) to be removed in seconds.

backoff.title: Backoff
backoff.description: How many seconds to wait between checks for the target pod status.

count.title: Pod count
count.description: Wait for at least this many pods to exist

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: How many seconds to wait for?

backoff.title: Backoff
backoff.description: How many seconds to wait between checks for the target pod status.

count.title: Pod count
count.description: Wait for at least this many pods to exist

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: How many seconds to wait for?

backoff.title: Backoff
backoff.description: How many seconds to wait between checks for the target pod status.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name(s) for target nodes. Required if label_selector is not set.

runs.title: Number of runs per node
runs.description: Number of times to inject each scenario under actions (will perform on same node each time)

label_selector.title: Label selector
label_selector.description:
Kubernetes label selector for the target nodes. Required if name is not set.
See https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/overview/working-with-objects/labels/ for details.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: Timeout to wait for the target pod(s) to be removed in seconds.

instance_count.title: Instance Count
instance_count.description: Number of nodes to perform action/select that match the label selector.

skip_openshift_checks.title: Skip Openshift Checks
skip_openshift_checks.description: Skip checking the status of the openshift nodes.

verify_session.title: Verify API Session
verify_session.description: Verifies the vSphere client session. It is enabled by default

kubeconfig_path.description:
Path to your Kubeconfig file. Defaults to ~/.kube/config.
See https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/configuration/organize-cluster-access-kubeconfig/ for details.

namespace.title: Namespace
namespace.description: Namespace of the pod to which filter need to be appliedfor details.

direction.title: Direction
direction.description: List of directions to apply filtersDefault both egress and ingress.

ingress_ports.title: Ingress ports
ingress_ports.description: List of ports to block traffic onDefault [], i.e. all ports

egress_ports.title: Egress ports
egress_ports.description: List of ports to block traffic onDefault [], i.e. all ports

kubeconfig_path.title: Kubeconfig path
kubeconfig_path.description:
Kubeconfig file as string
See https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/configuration/organize-cluster-access-kubeconfig/ for details.

pod_name.title: Pod name
pod_name.description: When label_selector is not specified, pod matching the name will beselected for the chaos scenario

label_selector.title: Label selector
label_selector.description: Kubernetes label selector for the target pod. When pod_name is not specified, pod with matching label_selector is selected for chaos scenario

kraken_config.title: Kraken Config
kraken_config.description: Path to the config file of Kraken. Set this field if you wish to publish status onto Cerberus

test_duration.title: Test duration
test_duration.description: Duration for which each step of the ingress chaos testing is to be performed.

wait_duration.title: Wait Duration
wait_duration.description: Wait duration for finishing a test and its cleanup.Ensure that it is significantly greater than wait_duration

instance_count.title: Instance Count
instance_count.description: Number of pods to perform action/select that match the label selector.

namespace.title: Namespace
namespace.description: Namespace of the pod to which filter need to be appliedfor details.

direction.title: Direction
direction.description: List of directions to apply filtersDefault both egress and ingress.

ingress_ports.title: Ingress ports
ingress_ports.description: List of ports to block traffic onDefault [], i.e. all ports

egress_ports.title: Egress ports
egress_ports.description: List of ports to block traffic onDefault [], i.e. all ports

kubeconfig_path.description:
Kubeconfig file as string

pod_name.description: When label_selector is not specified, pod matching the name will beselected for the chaos scenario

label_selector.title: Label selector
label_selector.description: Kubernetes label selector for the target pod. When pod_name is not specified, pod with matching label_selector is selected for chaos scenario

kraken_config.title: Kraken Config
kraken_config.description: Path to the config file of Kraken. Set this field if you wish to publish status onto Cerberus

test_duration.title: Test duration
test_duration.description: Duration for which each step of the ingress chaos testing is to be performed.

wait_duration.title: Wait Duration
wait_duration.description: Wait duration for finishing a test and its cleanup.Ensure that it is significantly greater than wait_duration

instance_count.title: Instance Count
instance_count.description: Number of pods to perform action/select that match the label selector.

execution_type.title: Execution Type
execution_type.description: The order in which the ingress filters are applied. Execution type can be 'serial' or 'parallel'
